text: Murray Theater, also known as the Richmond Civic Theater-Norbert Silbiger Theater, is a historic theatre building located at Richmond, Wayne County, Indiana. It was built in 1909, and is a three-story, steel frame and brick building with Chicago School and Beaux-Arts style design influences. The auditorium was originally designed to seat 751. Note: This includes and Accompanying photographs It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982. ==References== ==External links== *rGreenRoom Theater Archive Wiki: Murray Theatre (Richmond, Indiana) Category:Theatres on the National Register of Historic Places in Indiana Category:Beaux-Arts architecture in Indiana Category:Theatres completed in 1909 Category:Buildings and structures in Richmond, Indiana Category:National Register of Historic Places in Wayne County, Indiana Category:Chicago school architecture in Indiana
title: Murray Theater (Richmond, Indiana)
